actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the use of additional funds for salaries and expenses of the Special Committee to Investigate Whitewater Development Corporation and Related Matters, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides amounts out of the Senate Account for Expenses for Inquiries and Investigations for use not later than June 17, 1996, by the Special Committee to Investigate Whitewater Development Corporation and Related Matters. Requires the Special Committee to complete its investigation, study, and hearings by June 14, 1996, and to report to the Senate by June 17, 1996, on the results.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the use of additional funds for salaries and expenses of the Special Committee to Investigate Whitewater Development Corporation and Related Matters, and for other purposes.
